results.definition: a terrorist organization that seeks to overthrow the government dominated by Tutsi and to institute Hutu control again
examples: in 1999 ALIR guerrillas kidnapped and killed eight foreign tourists

results.definition: located at a great distance in time or space or degree
examples: we come from a far country
far corners of the earth
the far future
a far journey
the far side of the road
far from the truth
far in the future

results.definition: being of a considerable distance or length
examples: a far trek

results.definition: being the animal or vehicle on the right or being on the right side of an animal or vehicle
examples: the horse on the right is the far horse
the right side is the far side of the horse

results.definition: beyond a norm in opinion or actions
examples: the far right

results.definition: to a considerable degree; very much
examples: a far far better thing that I do
felt far worse than yesterday
eyes far too close together

results.definition: at or to or from a great distance in space
examples: he traveled far
strayed far from home
sat far away from each other

results.definition: at or to a certain point or degree
examples: I can only go so far before I have to give up
how far can we get with this kind of argument?
if we could see far into the future
all that happened far in the past

results.definition: to an advanced stage or point
examples: a young man who will go very far
